description: Download or Copy file with Extrac32
name: Suspicious Extrac32 Execution
query: ((process.command_line:*extrac32.exe* OR process.executable:*\\extrac32.exe OR winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"extrac32.exe") AND process.command_line:*.cab* AND process.command_line:(*\/C* OR *\/Y* OR *\ \\\*))
author: frack113
